      • getFilmIntro

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getFilmIntro()
        A method to get the film introduction list.
        返回:
        film introduction list

      • getPrice

        public double getPrice()
        A method to get the price of the film.
        返回:
        the price of film.

      • readReport

        public java.util.ArrayList<Film> readReport(int day)
        A method to read the information of specific day report.
        参数:
        day - which day's report.
        返回:
        the list of objects of Film type.

      • readScreenSchedule

        public void readScreenSchedule(int day)
        A method to read the schedules of all three screens respectively.
        参数:
        day - which day's schedule.

      • readInfo

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> readInfo(java.lang.String name)
        A method to read the information from a given file.
        参数:
        name - the file name to read.
        返回:
        the list that contains all information of the file

      • readScreen

        public int readScreen(int screenNum,
                      int startNo,
                      java.lang.String filmName,
                      int day)
        A method to read the seat information of specific screen at specific time.
        参数:
        screenNum - which screen
        startNo - the turn number of a specific film
        filmName - the name of the film
        day - which day
        返回:
        the number of the rest tickets.
